questions.question: Which of the following is one of the most fundamental characteristics of a data scientist?
options: Being proficient in R or Python
Having a sense of curiosity about all things
Using open-source software libraries and packages
Having a strong background in high power computing (HPC)
questions.correct_answer: Having a sense of curiosity about all things

questions.question: The field of data science is the process of ______________. Select all that apply.
options: Preparing data for analysis and processing
Working exclusively with spreadsheets and tables
Visualizing the results to reveal patterns
correct_answer: Preparing data for analysis and processing
Visualizing the results to reveal patterns

questions.question: When thinking about the 5 main Vs of data, what does Veracity refer to?
options: Refers to the vast amounts of data generated every second
Refers to the different types of data we can now use
Refers to the speed at which new data is generated and the speed at which data moves around
Refers to the trustworthiness of the data
questions.correct_answer: Refers to the trustworthiness of the data

questions.question: Data in all of its forms, both structured and unstructured, would be the focus of which of the following 5 Vs of data?
Which of the following are examples of unstructured data? Select all that apply.

A data analyst is reviewing an Excel spreadsheet from an insurance company. The customer data that she is analyzing is sorted by name, home address, policy number, etc. What type of data is she most likely working with?
